summary: Find B2B emails and enrich contacts using Dropcontact API.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Contact or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform (Enrich, Fetch Request, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: request id
parameters.description: The ID of the request to fetch data for a contact.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact to enrich.

parameters.name: simplify output (faster)
parameters.description: Toggle to simplify the output and return a request ID for later use.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include in the contact enrichment process.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the contact enrichment process.
